column5: The home is located in Canyon Oaks off of River Rd, just minutes from the River, Garner State Park, The Horse Pasture & the golf course. Home features large open kitchen and living area, 2 master bedrooms and can accommodate 14 very comfortable plus room for more. Our Frio Hideaway has large wrap around porch where you can sit and enjoy time with family and friends or just watching the deer. WiFi, TV, horseshoes, air hockey and there is plenty of parking for large groups.
